topic.title: Conref Source for Footnotes
topic.shortdesc: This topic is not meant for inclusion in a ditamap, but as a source of transcluded footnote content.

body.p: A footnote must exist in a paragraph, as it is an inline element, not a block element.

p.fn: Ament, K., 2003. Single Sourcing: Building Modular Documentation 1st ed., New York: William Andrew Publishing.
